title: The rise of the BFFFs: meet the families who do everything together, even after the kids have left home
text:
The Middletons and the Beckhams have done it – we reveal how

Every day, Charlotte Roy’s family WhatsApp group buzzes with a never-ending stream of conversation. She’s married now, with a high-flying career, yet her clan is still inseparable, hanging out at weekends and holidaying together – there’s even an annual siblings-only expedition. Roy, 38, who is the eldest of four, doesn’t find it at all odd that she’s still so close to her family. “We’re just great friends,” she says. “We’ve got a similar sense of humour and we bounce off each other in exactly the right way.”
